name: GetListRoles
description: Returns a list of available roles. The response is divided in pages. The query parameter `numItems` defines the number of items in each page, and consequently the amount of pages for the whole list.

Content-Type.description: The media type of the body of the request. Default value for license manager protocol is application/json

numItems.description: Number of items in the returned page

pageNumber.description: Which page from the whole list will be returned

sort.description: Chooses the field that the list will be sorted by

sortType.description: Defines the sorting order. ASC is used for ascendant order. DSC is used for descendant order

$block: Response body for listing all roles
